Reviews.Title: “I have stayed at this old-fashioned hotel several times because of its convenient location and fair price.”
Reviews.Author: globalNewYorkCity
Reviews.Content: hotel exceptionally located onehalf block fashionable kudamm shopping street close public transportation building elevator dated remodeled third floor bathrooms modern breakfast welcoming buffet meal offers plenty variety quality breads cold cuts fruit rates reasonable
